txt.en: Deliver the pelts to Thorin at Amdân
Thorin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou should deliver the pelts to Thorin.

'Hail, friend!

'The chill of winter is felt by all of the Haban'akkâ of Thráin, though some of our cousins are less accustomed to the cold. The Haban'akkâ has need of pelts that our crafters might make blankets and line the clothing of our warriors.

'Bears, wolves, and Wargs all dwell beyond these walls. Will you aid us and gather some pelts?'
The Haban'akkâ of Thráin has need of thick pelts to combat the bitter cold at Azanulbizar.

'Well done! These ought to keep our brethren warm for a time.\n\n'I will see that these are given to the crafters of each of the Seven Houses to help protect the Dwarves of the Haban'akkâ from this biting chill!'
Bears, Wargs, and wolves can be found throughout the woods of Azanulbizar.\n\nThorin has tasked you with collecting animal pelts to help keep warm the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.
